ctx: intros f a b c H eps.
exceptions.tactic: specialize (uniform_continuity_2d_1d f a b c H eps) as H'.
exceptions.exn: In environment f : R -> R -> R a, b, c : R H : forall x : R, a <= x <= b -> continuity_2d_pt f c x eps : posreal The term "H" has type "forall x : R, a <= x <= b -> continuity_2d_pt f c x" while it is expected to have type "forall x : R, a <= x <= b -> continuity_2d_pt f x c" (cannot unify "locally_2d (fun u v : R => Rabs (f u v - f c x) < eps0) c x" and "locally_2d (fun u v : R => Rabs (f u v - f x c) < eps0) x c").

ctx: intros f a b c H eps.
exceptions.exn: The reference H' was not found in the current environment.

ctx: intros f a b c H eps.
exceptions.exn: The reference delta was not found in the current environment.

ctx: intros f a b c H eps.
exceptions.tactic: intros x y u v H1 H2 H3 H4 H5 H6 H7.

ctx: intros f a b c H eps.
exceptions.exn: The reference H' was not found in the current environment.

original: intros f a b c H eps. specialize (uniform_continuity_2d_1d f a b c H eps) as H'. destruct H' as [delta H']. exists delta. intros x y u v H1 H2 H3 H4 H5 H6 H7. apply H'; auto.
